Package gui

Class LoginFrameController

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
gui.LoginFrameController
public class LoginFrameController extends javafx.application.Application
Controller class for the login screen of the application. Handles user login and guest login functionality.

  • Method Details

    • getLoginBtn

      private void getLoginBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws Exception
      Handles the action when the "Login" button is clicked. Validates the username and password fields and attempts to log in the user.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by the button click.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the login process.

    • getGuestBtn

      private void getGuestBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws Exception
      Handles the action when the "Enter as Guest" button is clicked. Logs the user in as a guest and transitions to the main menu.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by the button click.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the guest login process.

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage) throws Exception
      Starts the application by setting up the login screen.
      Specified by:
      start in class javafx.application.Application
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - the primary stage of the application.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while loading the FXML or setting up the stage.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method to launch the application.
      Parameters:
      args - the command-line arguments.
